name: Flashlight
description: Your smartphone is the new Flashlight.  This is the brightest and easy to use flashlight app. It is highly optimized for energy-efficiency and smaller size. More features will be updated soon!   Android 5 Lollipop or earlier: The app needs permission to access your camera to turn on the camera flash.
